Design Review Committee Meeting
Design Review Committee Meeting

Wednesday April 01 - 01:30 PM to 01:30 PM

Sonoma County, CA

The Design Review Committee (DRC) reviews and approves the design of significant new development projects, such as new commercial development. The Committee considers building and site design, architecture, colors, lighting, signs, landscaping and other design-related issues. Source: Sonoma County ...

Environmental Review Committee Meeting
Environmental Review Committee Meeting

Tuesday April 07 - 09:00 AM to 09:00 AM

Sonoma County, CA

The function of the Environmental Review Committee (ERC) is to review public projects in accordance with the California Environmental Quality Act (CEQA) to determine whether a Mitigated Negative Declaration or an Environmental Impact Report is required. Source: Sonoma County Government
